segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how reckless they're being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, he's going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so innocent, but she's part of this mischief too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't break any dishes if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, it's making me nervous just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on those cookies, they don't see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will catch them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
